---
title: "Analog Filter"
---

## Purpose

The Analog Filter transform applies a digital filter to an `AnalogTimeSeries`. This can be used to remove noise, isolate specific frequency bands, or perform other signal processing tasks.

## Parameters

| Name | Type | Description | Default |
|---|---|---|---|
| `filter_type` | string | The type of filter to apply. One of "lowpass", "highpass", "bandpass", "bandstop". | "lowpass" |
| `cutoff_frequency`| double | The cutoff frequency for lowpass and highpass filters, or the lower cutoff frequency for bandpass and bandstop filters. | 10.0 |
| `cutoff_frequency2`| double | The upper cutoff frequency for bandpass and bandstop filters. | 0.0 |
| `order` | integer | The order of the filter. Must be between 1 and 8. | 4 |
| `ripple` | double | The ripple for Chebyshev filters (in dB). Not used for Butterworth filters. | 0.0 |
| `zero_phase` | boolean | If true, applies the filter forward and backward to eliminate phase distortion. | false |

## JSON Schema

```json
{
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "transform": {
      "type": "string",
      "const": "Analog Filter"
    },
    "input": {
      "type": "string"
    },
    "output": {
      "type": "string"
    },
    "params": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "filter_type": {
          "type": "string",
          "enum": ["lowpass", "highpass", "bandpass", "bandstop"]
        },
        "cutoff_frequency": {
          "type": "number"
        },
        "cutoff_frequency2": {
          "type": "number"
        },
        "order": {
          "type": "integer",
          "minimum": 1,
          "maximum": 8
        },
        "ripple": {
          "type": "number"
        },
        "zero_phase": {
          "type": "boolean"
        }
      },
      "required": ["filter_type", "cutoff_frequency", "order"]
    }
  },
  "required": ["transform", "input", "output", "params"]
}
```

## Minimal Example

This example applies a 4th order lowpass Butterworth filter at 100 Hz.

```json
{
  "transform": "Analog Filter",
  "input": "my_analog_series",
  "output": "filtered_series",
  "params": {
    "filter_type": "lowpass",
    "cutoff_frequency": 100,
    "order": 4
  }
}
```
